did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Virginia Polytechnic Institute Faculty Tour of Allied Chemical Facilities Records, 1966

p.emph: Please note: The current finding aid includes only minimal description of the collection. If you have questions, please contact Special Collections (specref@vt.edu) for more information.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Photographs and other documentation of tour by Virginia Polytechnic Institute faculty of Allied Chemical Facilities in Hopewell, Virginia area on November 29, 1966. Faculty on the tour included Fred Bull, Wolter J. Fabrycky, R. Craig Fabian, G. H. Beyer, Carl Renfro, Nelson Murphy, Lee Humbert, Wilson Schmidt, Ron Patten, G. B. Pawley, R. R. Wright, Henry L. Wood, Alan Clifford, Harold Bell, William Hunter, and M. L. Oliver.
